entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or periods of drizzle beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low.
